body.name: Macally Premium Wired USB C Keyboard with USB Ports - Connect Up to 3 Devices - (2X USB-A |1x USB-C Ports) - Wired Keyboard for Mac Mini/Pro, iMac, MacBook, iPad, and PC - Full Size Type-C Keyboard
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 8 hrs 58 mins
features: (3 Extra Ports for Your Devices): Conveniently connect up to 3 devices like a mouse, flash drive, or webcam. Our PC and Mac compatible keyboard usb c is equipped with 2 USB-A ports and 1 USB-C port.
(Simple USB-C Wired Connection): A reliable solution for newer gen devices that utilize Type C ports. Plug and play, ready to be used as a macbook keyboard or imac keyboard.

(Seamless Compatibility): All 107 keys and 16 shortcut keys of our mac wired keyboard will be fully functional on Mac, PC, and Chrome. You'll be able to complete any task regardless of your operating system.

(Offers the Whole Package): Space gray finish for a touch of elegance, low profile design, quiet scissor switches, and an integrated typing angle, our PC and Mac keyboard wired delivers in aesthetics and practicality.

(What You'll Receive): At Macally your satisfaction is valued tremendously, so along with the wired mac keyboard usb c you'll also receive lifetime support, up to 2 years of warranty, and easy returns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great keyboard for a Mac Mini
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE After a lot of use: Still a nice keyboard, BUT...backlighting would have made it PERFECT. Not. Being so dark, it is hard to see in low light. I have shopped keyboards now too much. Waiting for 1. backlit, 2. silver or white, 3. connects with USB C as this does, and also 4. Has ports on the back like this does - so there ya go - this one but with backlighting. I don't want wireless, and I don't want Bluetooth. Hassles with batteries and charging have gotten so old. :) Macally if you are listening...I like cords. I wanted this keyboard despite it's width because it has 3 USB ports on it and I love ports too. So the mouse is plugged into the keyboard, and the keyboard is plugged into the mini and I have two more ports, including a C port, on the keyboard. Very handy these days, when laptops are almost portless. Along with the Satechi multiport my Mini is now a go. AND this keyboard came in the same color as my Mini - the dark Space Gray. So - as far as a Mac Mini goes, this is ideal. Had it awhile now and am happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice soft touch keyboard with built-in USB-C
reviews.reviewText: Everything just works here. Warning though, if you use this for sysadmin work you'll want to plug into integrated USB (C-A preferably) as this won't be recognized at boot fast enough to fire bios commands.Markings are PC/Mac compatible, but that doesn't take long to get used to. Just need to find a mouse with a 1ft cord to plug into this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought one to use when traveling and bought a second one for my desk. It would deserve 5 stars but it types double letters on occasion. The previous keyboard I bought from Amazon typed double letters about half the time so this is an improvement. The keys feel solid and the integrated USB ports are helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working exactly 1 year after purchase
reviews.reviewText: Keyboard was pretty good while it worked. Has a little too much "flex" across the entire body of the keyboard, which is mildly annoying. But big problem is that it just stopped working almost a year to the day after I purchased it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The keyboard urned up quickly and works perfectly as described. I can also plug my N52TE gamepad into the USB slot and it works on my Mac laptop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it's damn good
reviews.reviewText: better than it should be at this price. I beat on keyboards like red headed step children and this one just takes it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is a fine keyboard. I purchased this one in particular because it had connectivity for three USB-A devices connections, and there are no longer such keyboards available, except this one. Everything else has gone wirlesss these days, or uses USB-C. All my devices have been plugged into my old Apple keyboard which takes USB-A. This fine keyboard replaces my old Apple keyboard which developed flaws after many, many years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I've tried several keyboards on a budget and this one is absolutely the best I've tried. Amazing product. 2 USB-A and 1 USB-C makes a big difference. Easy to type. I work from home (editing) and I'm very happy with it.
Works great. Major improvement over my old Acer, mechanical one.

If you want a Keyboard with a USB-C hub - this is the one for you. The Keyboard itself it 'interesting' - you have to get used to the layout and the keys. It's OK - but the USB-C hub means it's so easy to plug in drives/devices right at the keyboard, which makes up for the actual use of the keyboard.
